12 #include <tuple>

15 #include "v8pp/call_from_v8.hpp"
16 #include "v8pp/ptr_traits.hpp"
17 #include "v8pp/throw_ex.hpp"
18 #include "v8pp/utility.hpp"

20 namespace v8pp {
21 
22 namespace detail {
23 
24 template<typename T>
25 using is_pointer_cast_allowed = std::integral_constant<bool,
26  sizeof(T) <= sizeof(void*) && std::is_trivial<T>::value>;
27 
28 template<typename T>
29 union pointer_cast
30 {
31 private:
32  void* ptr;
33  T value;
34 
35 public:
36  static_assert(is_pointer_cast_allowed<T>::value, "pointer_cast is not allowed");
37 
38  explicit pointer_cast(void* ptr) : ptr(ptr) {}
39  explicit pointer_cast(T value) : value(value) {}
40 
41  operator void*() const { return ptr; }
42  operator T() const { return value; }
43 };
44 
45 template<typename T>
46 class external_data
47 {
48 public:
49  static v8::Local<v8::External> set(v8::Isolate* isolate, T&& data)
50  {
51  external_data* value = new external_data;
52  try
53  {
54  new (value->storage()) T(std::forward<T>(data));
55  }
56  catch (...)
57  {
58  delete value;
59  throw;
60  }
61 
62  v8::Local<v8::External> ext = v8::External::New(isolate, value);
63  value->pext_.Reset(isolate, ext);
64  value->pext_.SetWeak(value,
65  [](v8::WeakCallbackInfo<external_data> const& data)
66  {
67  delete data.GetParameter();
68  }, v8::WeakCallbackType::kParameter);
69  return ext;
70  }
71 
72  static T& get(v8::Local<v8::External> ext)
73  {
74  external_data* value = static_cast<external_data*>(ext->Value());
75  return *static_cast<T*>(value->storage());
76  }
77 
78 private:
79  void* storage() { return &storage_; }
80  ~external_data()
81  {
82  if (!pext_.IsEmpty())
83  {
84  static_cast<T*>(storage())->~T();
85  pext_.Reset();
86  }
87  }
88  using data_storage = typename std::aligned_storage<sizeof(T)>::type;
89  data_storage storage_;
90  v8::Global<v8::External> pext_;
91 };
92 
93 template<typename T>
94 typename std::enable_if<is_pointer_cast_allowed<T>::value, v8::Local<v8::Value>>::type
95 set_external_data(v8::Isolate* isolate, T value)
96 {
97  return v8::External::New(isolate, pointer_cast<T>(value));
98 }
99 
100 template<typename T>
101 typename std::enable_if<!is_pointer_cast_allowed<T>::value, v8::Local<v8::Value>>::type
102 set_external_data(v8::Isolate* isolate, T&& value)
103 {
104  return external_data<T>::set(isolate, std::forward<T>(value));
105 }
106 
107 template<typename T>
108 typename std::enable_if<is_pointer_cast_allowed<T>::value, T>::type
109 get_external_data(v8::Local<v8::Value> value)
110 {
111  return pointer_cast<T>(value.As<v8::External>()->Value());
112 }
113 
114 template<typename T>
115 typename std::enable_if<!is_pointer_cast_allowed<T>::value, T&>::type
116 get_external_data(v8::Local<v8::Value> value)
117 {
118  return external_data<T>::get(value.As<v8::External>());
119 }
120 
121 template<typename Traits, typename F>
122 typename function_traits<F>::return_type
123 invoke(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args, std::false_type /*is_member_function_pointer*/)
124 {
125  return call_from_v8<Traits, F>(std::forward<F>(get_external_data<F>(args.Data())), args);
126 }
127 
128 template<typename Traits, typename F>
129 typename function_traits<F>::return_type
130 invoke(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args, std::true_type /*is_member_function_pointer*/)
131 {
132  using arguments = typename function_traits<F>::arguments;
133  static_assert(std::tuple_size<arguments>::value > 0, "");
134  using class_type = typename std::decay<
135  typename std::tuple_element<0, arguments>::type>::type;
136 
137  v8::Isolate* isolate = args.GetIsolate();
138  v8::Local<v8::Object> obj = args.This();
139  return call_from_v8<Traits, class_type, F>(
140  *class_<class_type, Traits>::unwrap_object(isolate, obj),
141  std::forward<F>(get_external_data<F>(args.Data())), args);
142 }
143 
144 template<typename Traits, typename F>
145 void forward_ret(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args, std::true_type /*is_void_return*/)
146 {
147  invoke<Traits, F>(args, std::is_member_function_pointer<F>());
148 }
149 
150 template<typename Traits, typename F>
151 void forward_ret(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args, std::false_type /*is_void_return*/)
152 {
153  args.GetReturnValue().Set(to_v8(args.GetIsolate(),
154  invoke<Traits, F>(args, std::is_member_function_pointer<F>())));
155 }
156 
157 template<typename Traits, typename F>
158 void forward_function(v8::FunctionCallbackInfo<v8::Value> const& args)
159 {
160  static_assert(is_callable<F>::value || std::is_member_function_pointer<F>::value,
161  "required callable F");
162 
163  v8::Isolate* isolate = args.GetIsolate();
164  v8::HandleScope scope(isolate);
165 
166  try
167  {
168  forward_ret<Traits, F>(args, is_void_return<F>());
169  }
170  catch (std::exception const& ex)
171  {
172  args.GetReturnValue().Set(throw_ex(isolate, ex.what()));
173  }
174 }
175 
176 } // namespace detail
177 
179 template<typename F>
180 v8::Local<v8::FunctionTemplate> wrap_function_template(v8::Isolate* isolate, F&& func)
181 {
182  using F_type = typename std::decay<F>::type;
183  return v8::FunctionTemplate::New(isolate,
184  &detail::forward_function<raw_ptr_traits, F_type>,
185  detail::set_external_data(isolate, std::forward<F_type>(func)));
186 }
187 
191 template<typename F>
192 v8::Local<v8::Function> wrap_function(v8::Isolate* isolate,
193  char const* name, F&& func)
194 {
195  using F_type = typename std::decay<F>::type;
196  v8::Local<v8::Function> fn = v8::Function::New(isolate->GetCurrentContext(),
197  &detail::forward_function<raw_ptr_traits, F_type>,
198  detail::set_external_data(isolate, std::forward<F_type>(func))).ToLocalChecked();
199  if (name && *name)
200  {
201  fn->SetName(to_v8(isolate, name));
202  }
203  return fn;
204 }
205 
206 } // namespace v8pp

v8pp::class_::unwrap_object
static object_pointer_type unwrap_object(v8::Isolate *isolate, v8::Local< v8::Value > value)
Get wrapped object from V8 value, may return nullptr on fail.
